column1: This file is given as an example.
DELETE the file before running the programpython script or the app for the first time.
This file will be automatically genereted in the same directory after you run the python script or the app for the first time.
It is IMPORTANT to always keep this file in the same directory as the python script or the executable app.
This csv database is used to keep track of which to which recipients emails has been sent and from which sender.
If for any reason the program crashes or you close the program
when the program reruns again it helps the program continue sending mails from where it was left off without repeating the same recipients.
